item.title: Github Pages and Hugo 📝
item.description: Warning This post is in active development and constantly changing. Why this article? I was researching which static site generator (SSG) to use when I'm starting my blog. There were a lot of possibilities, e.g. Jekyll that is directly promoted through Github. Nevertheless, I chose Hugo. Some of the reasons for Hugo were... It's build on Go and this is a programming language I want to learn during this year.
